senses.sense_definition: Действительное причастие прошедшего времени от глагола <w>захватываться</w>.

examples.text: Регион, неоднократно <w>захватывавшийся</w> соседними племенами, стал местом смешения разных культур.

target_lang_translations.en: The region, repeatedly <w>captured</w> by neighboring tribes, became a place where different cultures mixed.

examples.text: Студент, легко <w>захватывавшийся</w> новыми идеями, постоянно менял тему своего исследования.

target_lang_translations.en: The student, who was easily <w>captivated</w> by new ideas, constantly changed the topic of his research.

target_lang_definitions.en: Active past participle of the verb 'захватываться', indicating someone or something that was being seized, captured, or figuratively captivated.

en.target_lang_sense_clarification: taken into possession or control by force
taken hold of suddenly or forcibly
figurative; having one's attention or interest held
figurative; becoming overly enthusiastic or emotional
